item.title: ‘Landman’: Billy Bob Thornton and Demi Moore Partner Up in Tense Season 2 Trailer
item.description: The highly anticipated Big Oil drama returns Nov. 16 with combustible energy for Tommy Norris and his clan.

item.title: Demi Moore Speaks on Ex-Husband Bruce Willis’ Dementia as Star’s Wife Responds to Backlash
item.description: The Oscar-nominated actress praised Emma Heming Willis after the model-entrepreneur revealed she’s placed her husband in a separate, staffed home.

item.title: Why Do the Emmys Hate Taylor Sheridan Shows?
item.description: From ‘Landman’ to ‘1923’ to ‘Yellowstone’ to ‘Tulsa King,’ once again the prolific writer-producer-director’s dramas were almost entirely snubbed.

item.title: Why Do the Emmys Hate Taylor Sheridan Shows?
item.description: From ‘Landman’ to ‘1923’ to ‘Yellowstone’ to ‘Tulsa King,’ once again the prolific writer-producer-director’s dramas were almost entirely snubbed.
